code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import ProductCard from'../components/ProductCard';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductPage=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[product,setProduct]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/products/".concat(id)).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setProduct(data);setLoading(false);}).catch(()=>{setError('Failed to fetch product');setLoading(false);});},[id]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:'red'},children:error});if(!product)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Product not found."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{maxWidth:400,margin:'40px auto'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCard,{product:product})});};export default ProductPage;
